translation: "why are there still companies that collect and misuse our personal data? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it questions why companies are still able to collect and misuse personal data, highlighting the importance of data privacy and security. the hashtags used in the post help to reach a wider audience and to connect with others who are interested in the same topic.
